channel.title: Modify authentication server? 1.8.1
channel.description: i'm gonna try to make my own authentication server, so that players can register on my website instead of using the official minecraft authentication server. i'm not quite sure where to start, any tips?

item.title: Modify authentication server? 1.8.1
item.dc:creator: @justa_lol justa lol
item.description:
@justa_lol wrote:

i’m writing the server on my own, i’m not using bukkit… either way i figured out how. works perfectly, thanks david

item.title: Modify authentication server? 1.8.1
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:

[quote=“justa lol, post:13, topic:415297”][quote author=mironic link=topic=517249.msg3761648#msg3761648 date=1316912223]
look in bukkit mods.
[/quote]
now if i download a bukkit mod, how will that become “my own”? i’m trying to write it directly in the server souce code.[/quote] becuase it connects to “YOUR OWN” host and sets “YOUR” users up through “YOUR” site. posting a message saying “PLEASE REGISTER AT TO PLAY” HURP DURP!

item.title: Modify authentication server? 1.8.1
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:9, topic:415297”][quote author=mironic link=topic=517249.msg3761221#msg3761221 date=1316889743]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=517249.msg3761199#msg3761199 date=1316888525]
Yea he can, Moparisthebest does it.
[/quote] im pretty sure his server allows hacked clients.
[/quote]Yea, but MITB does exactly what this guy wants:

[quote author=justa lol link=topic=517249.msg3756705#msg3756705 date=1316531761]
i’m gonna try to make my own authentication server, so that players can register on my website instead of using the official minecraft authentication server.
[/quote]MITB verifies using the forums, and this guy wants to do it via his own server instead. (Same concept)[/quote] but still its easy its not bypassing authentication, its making your own authentication. theres lots of tutoirals on Minecraft forums to learn how to do it.

Read full topic
